hero.name: Hussain Burhanuddin
hero.title: Software Engineer | AI & Machine Learning Developer
hero.summary: Versatile and adaptable Software Engineer with a diverse skill set spanning AI/ML engineering, multi-agent systems, full-stack development, and cloud-native deployments. Experienced in building advanced AI systems, scalable backend architectures, and modern frontend interfaces.

responsibilities: Developed multi-AI agent systems using CrewAI and LangChain to automate complex workflows, enhance reasoning, and coordinate distributed agent tasks.
Built RAG pipelines leveraging LangChain, Pinecone, FAISS, and Milvus for high-performance semantic search and knowledge-augmented LLM applications.
Worked with leading LLMs (OpenAI, Gemini, Claude) for generative AI, conversational systems, and fine-tuned task-specific agent behavior.

Designed computer vision pipelines using OpenCV, YOLO, MTCNN, and MediaPipe Pose for player image analysis, extracting body/facial landmarks, and enabling prompt-based background generation and image editing.
Implemented OCR workflows using PyTesseract to extract structured invoice data for accounting and automation systems.

Built production-grade backend APIs with FastAPI and Django, integrated external services, and implemented Celery + Redis for asynchronous task processing; managed databases and migrations using SQLAlchemy + Alembic.
Delivered full-stack features using React, including dashboards and data visualizations with React Charts, while optimizing data pipelines, caching, and overall system performance.
Managed cloud-native deployments using AWS Lambda, EC2, Fargate, and SageMaker; containerized models with Docker; set up CI/CD with GitHub Actions; and deployed apps on Railway and Vercel.
Led the hiring, evaluation, and training of AI/ML talent, conducting interviews, building training paths, and mentoring trainees to production-level competence.

Architected and developed internal automation tools and workflows, including pipelines for supplier feed/stock processing, while designing the company-wide database architecture and ERDs using BigQuery.
Built an AI application for e-commerce, training ML models with Scikit-Learn for Amazon product hunting and implementing explainable AI insights using SHAP.
Delivered full-stack features using React on frontend and FastAPI on backend across multiple tools, ensuring performant APIs and smooth user experiences.
Developed a Flutter + FastAPI mobile application for scanning and managing returned Amazon products, integrating barcode scanning and real-time inventory tracking.
Created a Chrome extension for FBA/FMB profit calculations, incorporating scraping, Keepa integration, and backend processing via FastAPI.
Learned Python fundamentals, OOP, asynchronous programming, including coroutines, websockets, async/await, and multithreading; successfully cleared the Python Level 1 exam.
Gained hands-on experience with the OpenAI SDK, building agents, tools, and advanced AI interaction patterns, including agent cloning and task automation.
Practiced modern AI development workflows using the Gemini CLI, creating and testing AI-powered applications through prompt engineering and code generation.
Completed 6-month graduate training in SQL, Python (CS50), ML (ISLP), data warehousing, BI (Power BI), Design principles and data modelling principles.
Automated repetitive data validation tasks using Pandas, Python scripting, and BigQuery; improved reliability and speed of QA processes.
Supported Pepsi client project as part of the data quality team, ensuring clean and verified datasets for BI reports and dashboards built with Power BI.
Maintained and optimized client websites built in WordPress, improved UI responsiveness and site performance.
Delivered hands-on workshops and training in Python and robotics, teaching students fundamentals of automation and IoT.
Led the video production team, overseeing educational content creation, editing workflows, and publishing schedules.

achievements: Multi AI agent systems with Crewai – DeepLearning.ai
Supervised Machine Learning: Regression and Classification – DeepLearning.ai
JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures – FreeCodeCamp

backend_devops: AWS (S3, DynamoDB, EC2, Fargate, Lambda, CloudWatch, Step Functions, Sagemaker)
